title: PÖDÖR Premium Organic Apricot Seed Oil - 3.4 fl. oz. - Cold-Pressed, 100% Natural, Unrefined and Unfiltered, Vegan, Gluten-Free, Non-GMO in Glass Bottle
features: QUALITY – European Organic Certificate. Full of everything that is good for our bodies, this oil should not be missing from any household. Apricot seed oil is counted as one of the oldest known types of oil in the history of mankind – and it also counts as one of the most valuable! Due to this gentle processing the apricot seed oil retains all its goodness such as the vitamins E and B as well as unsaturated fatty acids.

NATURAL – Podor oils and vinegars are manufactured from 100% strictly controlled natural resources of best quality. In a complicated production process, the apricot kernels are exclusively mechanically pressed. Our 100% pure oils are filled unfiltered into dark in light protected glass bottles immediately after sedimentation.

INGREDIENTS – 100% oil from organic apricot seed. Apricot seed oil from Podor is exclusively cold-pressed. Non-GMO, no preservatives, no additives, no colorings. The combination of decades of experience, the best raw materials and a passion for excellent products make this cold-pressed oil pure indulgence.
PURE TASTE – When you open the bottle the delicate scent of marzipan as well as a whiff of Amaretto waft into your nose. They are 100% single-origin which makes the flavor even more intensive

USAGE – The secret in using the cold-pressed apricot seed oil lies in not heating it too much. The heat required for frying would damage or completely destroy the ingredients. That is why apricot seed oil is especially suitable as a base ingredient for salad dressings, besides the fact that it harmonizes well with fresh citrus juices. Tip: For some extra aroma drip a few drops of the oil over fresh pasta dishes or soups!
description: The multi-purpose oil for cuisine and body

Apricot seed oil is counted as one of the oldest known types of oil in the history of mankind – and it also counts as one of the most valuable! In the days of ancient China the golden oil won from the kernel of the apricot was prized due to its positive effect on beauty. When you open the bottle the delicate scent of marzipan as well as a whiff of Amaretto waft into your nose. In a complicated production process, the apricot kernels are exclusively mechanically pressed. Due to this gentle processing the apricot seed oil retains all its goodness such as the vitamins E and B as well as unsaturated fatty acids.

Full of everything that is good for our bodies, this oil should not be missing from any household. However it is important that the apricot seed oil is of organic origin, cold-pressed and unrefined, as only then are the valuable ingredients retained. The secret in using the cold-pressed apricot seed oil lies in not heating it too much. The heat required for frying would damage or completely destroy the ingredients. That is why apricot seed oil is especially suitable as a base ingredient for salad dressings, besides the fact that it harmonizes well with fresh citrus juices. Tip: For some extra aroma drip a few drops of the oil over fresh pasta dishes or soups!
it can be stored for 18 months in a cold, dry space protected from sunshine. The exact expiry date is displayed on the bottle.
